clean_data: Filemaker Developer Filemaker span lDeveloperspan VivaLaData Poultney VT I have been programming with databases on and off the web since the early 90s I have a virtual private server at paircom to host websites ftp and email In addition to web and interface development my services include data analysis extraction conversion encryption process automation and workflow processes using FileMaker SQL PHP CSS HTML javascript applescript and command line language for DOS and unix I have integrated with Brandwise Periship Shopify Braintree Paypal Authorizenet Quickbooks and numerous other crossplatform systems Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Filemaker Developer Skeem Design Philadelphia PA May 2017 to Present I built and maintain a FileMaker system that goes between their sales through Brandwise and AccountEdge We also use FileMaker to make custom reports Database Developer Web Developer Web Application Developer Outpatient Surgery Magazine Malvern PA June 2005 to Present Ive built and maintained numerous systems for Outpatient Surgery Magazine incorporating with existing solutions as well as starting from scratch We manage mailouts content pricing proposals and participation in their annual conference I built them a badge scanning system for conference attendees and have integrate FileMaker with MySQL systems that I or others have built Ive also built secure web interfaces to the MySQL databases Ive built for them using javascript CSS HTML and PHP Database Developer Web Developer Woodstock Film Festival Woodstock NY July 2003 to Present I built up their website into a custom MySQL PHP backed system that used FileMaker as a back end interface to coordinate their online sales with their box office in real time We printed tickets on demand with thermal printers incorporated credit card readers cash drawers and receipt printers on Windows machines with their FileMaker interface Senior Engineer Productive Computing San Marcos CA May 2019 to July 2019 Fulltime FileMaker Pro database and web development They laid me off due to lack of work I decided that parttime work was a better fit to balance family obligations but I may be back parttime as a consultant for special projects Filemaker Developer Mahrberg Wealth AG Lichtenstein August 2017 to November 2018 Automated German and Austrian taxes for funds in FileMaker Pro FileMaker Developer Web Developer DDB New York NY July 2000 to June 2018 Database and process automation with FileMaker Pro integration with web graphic uploads Developed online job application system for their website using PHP Database Developer Web Developer GrowandBehold Brooklyn NY July 2010 to December 2017 I built and maintained the initial system that GrowandBehold used to take their business from just an idea to a multimillion dollar business in only a few years We had a MySQL PHP backed website with a FileMaker admin for order processes and to allow customers to manage their own accounts We managed content mailings coupons referral incentives and more through this system We integrated our shipping system with Periship FileMaker Developer Web Developer Omnicom University New York NY October 2001 to October 2017 Database and web development using FileMaker and Lasso Filemaker Developer Kaz Incorporated Hudson NY November 1998 to March 2011 I built and maintained FileMaker systems for Kaz for quality control and consumer support product replacement and returns Database Developer Web Developer Earthcare Technologies Springfield VA March 2004 to June 2009 Developed a war memorial kiosk interface installed in Memorial Hall of the Annapolis Naval Academy Developed database and interactive web for multiple years of FPED Force Protection Equipment Demonstration Database Developer Tiffany Co Process New York NY September 1997 to January 2007 Process automation and database development Tied Canto Cumulus to FileMaker Pro and automated
